title: muting pings

embed.description: first of all i understand the need for the ping system in a game with no integrated voice comms (which im 70% happy with tbh), pings are the next best thing.

body: here is something i just posted, except i think i posted on NA boards lmao please read and vote

replies.body:
you can already mute pings dummy

go ingame, go to sounds go down to ping volume, press the sound icon so its got a line through it.
i never knew this, thank you
